message: I don’t think I’ve seen you around, but I just wanted to say hello. No friends in common, so travel different circles I assume. Regardless, nice to meet you 🙏
I havent seen u around either, but hard to see ur face on ur pic
I typically hang out in Seminyak.
And you?
Strong man!
Mostly around kerobokan umalas I guess hehe
I live in Umalas, so I guess that’s what makes Seminyak inviting.
I’m actually in the US right now visiting family. You popped up on my threads. Your natural smile caught my attention.
Thank u Gil. Tell me a bit about yourself
What do you want to know?
Started a factory in Java 9 years ago and Been traveling back and forth from US to Indonesia since. Moved to Bali full time 4 years ago.
Personal… Have always been an active person. So I go to the gym as often as my schedule allows. Tennis and golf are both favorites of mine.
Travel… It part of my life, usually to entertain my clients and friends. But I always give myself some free time 😁
How about you?
Honestly it was nice talking to you. I hope you find what you are looking for 🙏. Cheers
That's awesome you've built such an interesting life between Java and Bali! I love how active you stay with tennis and golf too. What's your favorite course to play here?
Actually I assumed you stopped messaging 😂. Actually I live a pretty crazy lifestyle balance between healthy, party, and travel.
Kinda find small talk limited to getting to know someone imo. Dinner locally as friends is much more interesting.
But I would love to learn about you, I mean other than your images, I know very little 😁
We can follow on IG, might give you more insight on who I am. But I’m just an artist masquerading as a CEO, my staff do all the real work 🙏
Haha well I promise I'm real 😊 Just a uni student balancing accounting classes with village projects right now. Your artist/CEO combo sounds fascinating though, what kind of art do you create?
Www.sophstone.com
Exclusive Original Bathware | Trough Sinks | by SOPHSTONE
This is my business. I’m the designer of all the collections. I actually just started another business recently 😂

quoted_text: Haha well I promise I'm real 😊 Just a uni student balancing accounting c…
message: Thank you for this response, because it’s much more natural 😅🙏

Hey Gil! Sorry for the late reply, got caught up with my village project ❤️ Your Sophstone designs look incredible, such a unique blend of art and functionality. What inspired you to start designing bathware?

I had art exhibitions in my early days, but transitioned into business simply because I couldn’t really afford to be a full time artist. But when a business presented itself that also allowed me to be creative once again, I jumped on the opportunity.
Now days I focus entirely on designing new collections and entertaining my clients in other countries (my travel).
My staff handles day to day business development, marketing, etc.
So you are an accountant student. This is the profession you will enjoy?
Describe village projects…

That's really cool how you blended art and business! Accounting wasn't my first choice honestly, but I'm growing to enjoy the structure of it. The village project is about building doing some infrastructural improvements, trash management and stuff like that, today we cleaned a river.
A little event at Kudeta. Miss Putri Indonesia was serving drinks

quoted_text: That's really cool how you blended art and business! Accounting wasn't m…
message: I’m a little interested in your village work. Is this just for school or a passion of yours?
As a business, I always try to help where we can. During the pandemic help was needed everywhere 🙏
